attributes.action: Restrict the horsepower/engine size of vehicles driven by New Drivers as is already done with Motorcycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young and New drivers at without doubt one of the highest risk groups for being involved in serious/fatal Road Traffic Collisions in the UK. As it stands New/Young drivers are able to purchase/drive/modify vehicles with high power outputs before they have learnt the art of responsible driving. I believe that by restricting the horsepower/engine size of vehicles used by new drivers as is already done with motorcycles we can noticably reduce road death and serious injury to drivers, passengers and pedestrians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
